overview: 101 views  Sep 27, 2015  A tense sci-fi thriller from award winners Ian Miller and Lexie Greenawalt, this film questions the morality and truth of personhood, examining what it means to be alive, and what life truly is through the eyes of an artificial intelligence being pursued by her creators.  When an artificial intelligence designed to defend government data and systems from cyberthreats, delete said cyberthreats with ease, and hack into any software in the world escapes from the lab where she is created, all hell breaks loose. The government sends out an elite hacking team to hunt down the artificial intelligence. Meanwhile, CDAI befriends Jamie, and together, they will struggle to avoid detection and stay alive.
title: CDAI
